content: ecosystem. Figure 1-1 Lakehouses combine the best of data warehouses and data lakes Data storage paradigms are cumulative. They do not disappear or are replaced by the next paradigm. They must coexist. As these technologies mature, organizations recognize the value that each paradigm provides at performing certain tasks. Every step of an organization’s data or AI journey is critical. AI is not magic; it requires a thoughtful and well-designed approach. For example, most AI failures are due to problems in data preparation and data organization, and not the AI models themselves. Success with AI models depends on achieving success first with how the data is collected, stored, organized, and managed. Chapter 1.
